title: 【OOC】僵尸骷髅强化MOD1.8
author: 新之助~
txt_content:
本帖最后由 新之助~ 于 2016-12-19 22:28 编辑 

================================================================

介绍

================================================================

OOC让僵尸骷髅强化
防晒
这个大部分人应该都知道，僵尸骷髅神马的一戴上帽子就不怕阳光，所以我就给所有的僵尸骷髅带上了僵尸头颅。

================================================================

指令

================================================================

/summon FallingSand ~ ~1 ~ {Tile:152,Time:10,Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"fill ~ ~-19 ~1 ~ ~-1 ~1 redstone_block"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"summon FallingSand ~2 ~-12 ~6 {Block:"minecraft:redstone_block",Time:1}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"summon FallingSand ~3 ~-12 ~10 {}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"summon FallingSand ~1 ~-11 ~10 {}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"summon FallingSand ~3 ~-10 ~9 {}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"summon FallingSand ~1 ~-9 ~9 {}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"summon FallingSand ~3 ~-8 ~8 {}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"summon FallingSand ~1 ~-7 ~8 {}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"summon FallingSand ~3 ~-6 ~7 {id:FallingSand,Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/replaceitem entity @e[type=Zombie] slot.armor.head minecraft:skull 1 2"},Riding:{}}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"summon FallingSand ~1 ~-5 ~7 {id:FallingSand,Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/replaceitem entity @e[type=Skeleton] slot.armor.head minecraft:skull 1 0"},Riding:{}}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"summon FallingSand ~3 ~-4 ~6 {id:FallingSand,Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"fill ~-1 ~0 ~ ~-1 ~ ~4 redstone_block 0"},Riding:{}}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"summon FallingSand ~1 ~-3 ~6 {id:FallingSand,Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"fill ~1 ~0 ~ ~1 ~ ~4 stone 0"},Riding:{}}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"fill ~1 ~-2 ~6 ~3 ~-2 ~10 air 0"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"fill ~ ~0 ~5 ~4 ~0 ~11 quartz_block 0"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"fill ~ ~ ~5 ~4 ~1 ~11 stained_glass 0"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"fill ~ ~ ~5 ~4 ~ ~11 quartz_block 0"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/setblock ~2 ~2 ~4 wall_sign 1 replace {Text1:"{text:\\"~作者~\\",bold:False,italic:False,underlined:False,strikethrough:False,color:black,clickEvent:{action:run_command,value:\\"fill ~2 ~-1 ~ ~-2 ~1 ~8 air\\"}}",Text2:"{text:\\"新之助~\\",bold:False,italic:False,underlined:False,strikethrough:False,color:black,clickEvent:{action:run_command,value:\\"fill ~2 ~-1 ~ ~-2 ~1 ~8 air\\"}}",Text3:"{text:\\"骷髅僵尸强化MOD\\",bold:False,italic:False,underlined:False,strikethrough:False,color:black,clickEvent:{action:run_command,value:\\"fill ~2 ~-1 ~ ~-2 ~1 ~8 air\\"}}",Text4:"{text:\\"关闭系统\\",bold:False,italic:False,underlined:False,strikethrough:False,color:black,clickEvent:{action:run_command,value:\\"fill ~2 ~-1 ~ ~-2 ~1 ~8 air\\"}}"}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/gamerule commandBlockOutput false"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/say 欢迎使用僵尸骷髅强化MOD"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"setblock ~ ~-1 ~1 redstone_block"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"fill ~ ~ ~ ~ ~23 ~1 air"}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}复制代码
================================================================


教程

================================================================


/replaceitem entity @e[type=Zombie] slot.armor.head minecraft:skull 1 2
让僵尸带上僵尸帽子
/replaceitem entity @e[type=Skeleto] slot.armor.head minecraft:skull 1 0
让骷髅带上骷髅帽子




================================================================

@大法



================================================================


@FHC红石 @籽岷 @quangegegege @lishanglin @地上的灰尘 



================================================================

replies.author: MathBell
replies.txt_content: 根据介绍内容（指令没看23333）只是白天不自燃？这个强化……比较弱？

replies.author: 新之助~
replies.txt_content:
MathBell 发表于 2016-12-19 22:55
根据介绍内容（指令没看23333）只是白天不自燃？这个强化……比较弱？
怪我咯.....

replies.author: ruhuasiyu
replies.txt_content: 这这这不还是一句话的事吗？

replies.author: 玄素
replies.txt_content:
新之助~ 发表于 2016-12-19 22:59
怪我咯.....
很有意思。你做的东西你觉得该怪谁。
说真的，学东西要踏实。

replies.author: Java_command
replies.txt_content:
很不错，希望你自己进化一下233
你这个排版需要练习，分割线可以用论坛的，彩色字之类的也加上一点，不要弄太花即可～

replies.author: 新之助~
replies.txt_content:
玄素 发表于 2016-12-20 00:26
很有意思。你做的东西你觉得该怪谁。
说真的，学东西要踏实。
恩恩 下次一定

replies.author: Ouli
replies.txt_content: 那不就可以轻轻松松拿到小白和僵尸的头颅了qwq？

replies.author: BlackCB.
replies.txt_content:
Ouli 发表于 2017-8-16 14:58
那不就可以轻轻松松拿到小白和僵尸的头颅了qwq？
然而并没有设置物品掉落

replies.author: Ouli
replies.txt_content:
天狼星black 发表于 2017-8-17 11:21
然而并没有设置物品掉落
用抢夺III的剑 去打僵尸和小白， 有很大几率会掉头

replies.author: 無名Five
replies.txt_content: 然而我们需要的是凋零骷髅头

replies.author: BlackCB.
replies.txt_content:
Ouli 发表于 2017-8-17 16:12
用抢夺III的剑 去打僵尸和小白， 有很大几率会掉头
然而在设置指令的时候没有设置的话根本不可能掉落！
新人你的指令功底仍需努力
